alert.note: Alert for Banner; Cheyenne; Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 10:53AM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Cheyenne, southwestern Morrill and eastern Banner Counties through 1030 AM MDT... At 952 AM MDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bridgeport to near Court House And Jail Rocks to 8 miles northwest of Dalton to 9 miles south of Redington. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea to Half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail may cover roadways leading to slick travel. Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, Dalton, Gurley, Court House And Jail Rocks, Northport and The Intersection Of Highway 385 And 92. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
